lines.name: Benji
lines.text: Ok, that wasn't really fair of me was it?  Let me give you something to break out more easily.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: I designed these single-use boltcutters to fit around your jaws.

lines.name: Benji
lines.text: Just [color=#44ddff]use an item[/color] (the R key) and select the boltcutters to start breaking the trap.
